title: AMP Up Your Mobile Site
description: At Justia, we have been hard at work keeping our clients’ websites and blogs updated according to online marketing best practices, with our latest initiative being the addition of Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP). On our Onward law and technology blog, one of our engineers provides an overview of how the mobile web has evolved over time, and how Google’s AMP project is the most recent iteration of the effort to ensure that websites load as efficiently as possible for the growing ranks of mobile users.
